span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 蒸馏：to increase the concentration of, separate, or purify by or as if by distillation.
【例】 distill the water before pouring倒 it in the steam iron
【近】 purify, filter, refine, fine
【派】 distillate n. 蒸馏物，纯化物，本质：a purified form; an essence
【考法 2】 v. 渗出；滴下： to fall or let fall in or as if in drops
【例】The basement walls distill water every time it rains heavily. 地下室的墙壁每次下大雨都渗出水来。
【近】distill, dribble, drop, trickle
【记】 dis + 音：滴馏，滴蒸馏水；still 有蒸馏的意思；still water 死水，静水；
【另】 still 有蒸馏的意思，instill (向里滴)一滴滴灌入，distill 蒸馏
Good habits are the keys to all success. 好习惯是成功的关键。
